Flow.description: Capture Measuring Points from Work Order Measuring Point Created as part of SFS-2997 Updated As Part Of SFS-5421 Updated as part of SFS-3058 Updated as part of SFS-3012/3064 Updated as part of SFS-3011 Updated as part of SFS-4870 Updated as fix of SFS-5975 Updated for SFS-7719 ( Reading <0 check removed) Updated as part of sfs-8908 Updated as a part of SFL-714
Flow.interviewLabel: FSM Capture Measuring Points - WO Measuring Point {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: FSM Capture Measuring Points - WO Measuring Point
